          <title>

lumbrera, marfil,</string>

            <string language="hu">elefántcsont faragvány Bizáncból, a barberini diptychon</string>
            <string language="en">The Barberini-diptychon is an ivory carving from Byzantium.</string>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Barberini-diptychon ist ein Elfenbein, das

            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Barberini-diptychon est un ivoire découpant

            <string language="x-mt-it">Il Barberini-diptychon è un avorio che intaglia
